mapper.select: SELECT facility_id AS facilityId, name, location, type, contact, operating_hours AS operatingHours, availability, rating_score AS ratingScore, review_count AS reviewCount, popularity, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM facilities

SELECT facility_id AS facilityId, name, location, type, contact, operating_hours AS operatingHours, availability, rating_score AS ratingScore, review_count AS reviewCount, popularity, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM facilities WHERE facility_id = #{facilityId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO facilities (name, location, type, contact, operating_hours, availability, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{location}, #{type}, #{contact}, #{operatingHours}, #{availability}, NOW(), NOW())
